A note on passive income from assets:

- Dividends, capital gains, and rental income are all taxed less than active income

- Preferential tax treatment, depreciation, business expenses, interest expense, and write-offs lower taxes against this income

The wealthy lower taxes in 3 ways:

- Borrow against appreciating assets
- Passive income from their assets
- Reduce their active incomes

They strategize and learn the system
